BusinessLayerInsterface

Interface ChatServerInt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ChatServerInt
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This is an interface that includes the RMI methods on the server's side

        UserDTO login(UserDTO user)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method enable the client to login
        Parameters:
        user - user object created from the info given by the user
        Returns:
        user object created from the database if the validation was correct
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - .

      • transferHandle

        void transferHandle(com.healthmarketscience.rmiio.RemoteInputStream ris,
                    java.lang.String user,
                    java.lang.String fileName)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method handle the file transfer by sending a request to the remote object with unique email sent as a parameter
        Parameters:
        ris - a remote input stream, used in file transfer over RMI
        user - email of the file receiver
        fileName - name of the file to be received
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - .
